productDes:
High-performance gaming laptop.

Specs:
- Intel i9 processor
- 32GB RAM
- 1TB SSD
- RTX 3080 GPU
- 17.3" 144Hz display

Warranty: 2 years international warranty

Elegant modern wooden coffee table with a sleek design and storage options.

Features:
- High-quality engineered wood with a smooth finish
- Spacious tabletop with hidden storage compartment
- Sturdy metal legs for a contemporary look
- Scratch and water-resistant coating

Material & Care
Material: Engineered wood, metal legs
Care: Wipe clean with a damp cloth, avoid direct sunlight

High-back ergonomic gaming chair with adjustable features for maximum comfort.

Features:
- Adjustable armrests & lumbar support
- Reclining function (90°-160°)
- PU leather & memory foam padding
- Smooth-rolling caster wheels

Material & Care
Material: PU leather, metal frame, high-density foam
Care: Wipe clean with a damp cloth, avoid direct sunlight

Smart air purifier with HEPA filter.

Features:
- HEPA filtration
- Air quality sensor
- Auto mode
- Silent operation
- App control

Warranty: 1 year manufacturer warranty
